-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A proof-of-concept Haskell to WebAssembly compiler.
--   
--   A proof-of-concept Haskell to WebAssembly compiler.
@package puellascript
@version 0.0.1

module Language.PuellaScript.Compiler.Flags
data Flags
Flags :: [FilePath] -> [String] -> FatalMessager -> LogAction -> (ModSummary -> CgGuts -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> CoreProgram -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()) -> (ModSummary -> Stream IO RawCmmGroup () -> IO ()) -> Flags
[importPaths] :: Flags -> [FilePath]
[targets] :: Flags -> [String]
[fatalMessager] :: Flags -> FatalMessager
[logAction] :: Flags -> LogAction
[coreHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> CgGuts -> IO ()
[corePrepHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> CoreProgram -> IO ()
[stgFromCoreHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()
[stgHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> [StgTopBinding] -> IO ()
[cmmFromStgHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()
[cmmHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> Stream IO CmmGroup () -> IO ()
[cmmRawHook] :: Flags -> ModSummary -> Stream IO RawCmmGroup () -> IO ()
defaultFlags :: Flags

module Language.PuellaScript.Compiler.Run
run :: Flags -> IO ()
